detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Fine-knit jumper with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, wide, pleated skirt in a textured weave with vertical fringing. High waist with a smooth, extended waistband, and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Lined.
Short, straight-style dress in woven fabric with a high, frilled collar, yoke and covered buttons down the front. Long, wide puff sleeves with a short slit and button at the cuffs. Unlined.

Cropped, off-the-shoulder blouse in soft cotton seersucker with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short puff sleeves with pin-tucks, inset embroidery and narrow elastication at the hems. Elastication and a flounced trim at the hem.
One-shoulder top in organic cotton jersey with 3/4-length sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back with decorative straps.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow cuffs and ties, a yoke with concealed pleats at the back, and side pockets.
Fitted, V-neck dress in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip in one side and a high slit at the back.

Top in soft, airy viscose jersey with a wider neckline, long raglan sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Narrow elastication around the neckline and cuffs.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front, patch pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Fitted jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a wide flounced trim layered over the top that continues over the shoulders. Deep V-neck with beaded embroidery, shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a stand-up collar, a visible zip at the front and long sleeves.
Sandals with open toes, wrapover foot straps and elastication at the heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 8 cm.
Aqua shoes in scuba fabric with elastication around the top, a loop at the back and textured rubber soles.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Skirt in an airy weave with pleated frills and an elasticated waist. Short jersey underskirt.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder top in jersey with a wide V-neck, wrapover front and long sleeves.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, front and back pockets and straight hems.
Kids Exclusive. T-shirt in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Trainers in canvas with a padded top edge and tongue, lacing at the front, and imitation leather heel caps. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and patterned rubber soles.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a faux fur pompom at the top and embroidery on the turned-up hem.
Short, shiny metal chain necklace. Adjustable length, 41-50 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit with wide ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper knitted in soft, fluffy yarn with a V-neck front and back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Block-coloured top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ties at the hem. Long, slightly wider sleeves with gathered cuffs.
Vest tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.

Ankle-length dress in a crinkled viscose weave with a low neckline front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist, a narrow, detachable tie belt with tassels, and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, pleated skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist. Lined.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets and gently tapered legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.
Shopper in a cotton jacquard weave with two handles at the top, decorative tassels and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 12x30x40 cm.
Padded slippers in soft velour with an embroidered motif and appliqués on the front. Velour linings and insoles and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
V-neck, long-sleeved jumper in soft cashmere in a straight-cut relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in a soft modal and cotton blend with short slits in the sides and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Top in jersey crêpe with a cut-out pattern and scalloped trim at the hem, and short sleeves with scalloped trims.
Cycling shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wide waistband containing a key pocket.
Metal hoop earrings. Diameter 6 cm.

Short-sleeved polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a collar and button placket. The shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Sports shorts in heavy jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
5-pocket, low-rise trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.

Long-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a round neck with an opening at the front and ties at the top. Small opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, and smocking with a flounce at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in cotton with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem.
Fitted polo-neck top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with short sleeves and short slits in the sides.

Padded ski mittens in functional fabric with embossed rubber on the palms, and an adjustable hook and loop tab and elastication at the cuffs. Reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Top in jersey made from a viscose blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and narrow shoulder straps.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Textured metal earrings. Length 4.2 cm.
Thong briefs in lace with a high waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Push-up bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck, a decorative bow at the front and a metal fastener at the back.
Iron-on fabric patches. Size approx. 7 cm.

Straight-style, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Short skirt with a high waist and a detachable, adjustable belt at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains is decorated with spherical pendants and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length.
Bootees in soft, fine-knit cotton with foldover ribbing at the top and jersey linings. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Knee-length lace dress with a V-neck and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, flared skirt and a concealed zip at the back.
Short, A-line dress in a viscose weave with a deep V-neck. Long, wide raglan sleeves, narrow elastication at the cuffs, and gathered, asymmetric seams for added width. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt, zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and an open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch velour with a V-neck, wrapover and long sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Backpack in a woven fabric with a handle and zip at the top, adjustable, padded shoulder straps and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Depth 10 cm. Width 25 cm. Height 34 cm.
